scenario_1.persona_desc: A computer enthusiast who is interested in the latest technology trends and is looking for ways to optimize their computer system for better performance. They are particularly interested in the motherboard and graphics card components and are looking for information on how to choose the best motherboard and graphics card for their needs. They are also interested in learning about the latest advancements in technology and how they can apply them to their computer system.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the higher payout, which is Right: A receives $750, B receives $400. Although the other person receives more, I still receive $400 which is the same as the other option.
